016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jersey.client.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.api.DnsLookup;
019import jakarta.ws.rs.ProcessingException;
020import jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder;
021import org.glassfish.jersey.client.ClientRequest;
022import org.glassfish.jersey.client.ClientResponse;
023import org.glassfish.jersey.client.spi.AsyncConnectorCallback;
024import org.glassfish.jersey.client.spi.Connector;
025
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.util.Iterator;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.concurrent.Future;
030
031public class SRVConnector
032        implements Connector {
033    private DnsLookup dnsLookup;
034    private final Connector delegate;
035
036    public SRVConnector(DnsLookup dnsLookup, Connector delegate) {
037        this.dnsLookup = dnsLookup;
038        this.delegate = delegate;
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public ClientResponse apply(ClientRequest request) {
043
044        if (request.getUri().getScheme().equals("srv")) {
045            URI srvUri = request.getUri();
046            List<URI> servers = dnsLookup.resolve(srvUri).join();
047            ProcessingException throwable = null;
048            for (URI server : servers) {
049
050                if (server.getScheme().equals("srv"))
051                    throw new ProcessingException("Could not resolve " + srvUri);
052
053                request.setUri(server);
054                ClientResponse clientResponse = null;
055                try {
056                    return delegate.apply(request);
057                } catch (ProcessingException t) {
058                    // Try next server
059                    throwable = t;
060                }
061            }
062            if (throwable != null)
063                throw throwable;
064
065            throw new ProcessingException("Could not resolve " + srvUri);
066        }
067
068        return delegate.apply(request);
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public Future<?> apply(ClientRequest request, AsyncConnectorCallback callback) {
073
074        if (request.getUri().getScheme().equals("srv")) {
075            URI srvUri = request.getUri();
076            return dnsLookup.resolve(srvUri).whenComplete((servers, exception) ->
077            {
078                if (servers != null) {
079                    Iterator<URI> serverIterator = servers.iterator();
080                    if (serverIterator.hasNext()) {
081                        URI server = serverIterator.next();
082                        request.setUri(server);
083                        delegate.apply(request, new AsyncConnectorCallback() {
084                            @Override
085                            public void response(ClientResponse response) {
086                                callback.response(response);
087                            }
088
089                            @Override
090                            public void failure(Throwable failure) {
091                                if (serverIterator.hasNext()) {
092                                    URI server = serverIterator.next();
093                                    request.setUri(server);
094                                    delegate.apply(request, this);
095                                } else {
096                                    callback.failure(failure);
097                                }
098                            }
099                        });
100                        callback.response(delegate.apply(request));
101                    } else
102                        callback.failure(new ProcessingException("Could not resolve " + srvUri));
103                } else {
104                    callback.failure(exception);
105                }
106            });
107        } else
108        {
109            return delegate.apply(request, callback);
110        }
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public String getName() {
115        return delegate.getName();
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public void close() {
120        delegate.close();
121    }
122}
